long_description: Fortified with built-in insect repellent, the Columbia Insect Blocker(TM) Bandana keeps bugs off your skin without the sticky residue or harsh odor of bug sprays. Insect Blocker(TM) technology uses permethrin to repel mosquitoes, chiggers and other potentially disease-carrying insects; effective through 70 washes. Cotton fabric is naturally soft, lightweight and breathable.
short_description: Fortified with built-in insect repellent, the Columbia Insect Blocker(TM) Bandana keeps bugs off your skin without the sticky residue or harsh odor of bug sprays.
